title: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       There are no entrance fees associated with Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument.  All of our ranger-guided tours and programs are free as well. Please note, we do require advance reservations for all tours. Please call 806-857-3151 (weekdays) or 806-857-6680 (weekends) to reserve your place in a group tour.
